definitions.title: interj. alas!
definitions.body: Ju Jdg 11:35, 2Ki 3:10, 2Ki 6:5, 2Ki 6:15; with [[ל]] Joe 1:15 [[אֲהָהּ לַיּוֹם]]  alas for the day! for etc. In the combination [[אֲהָהּ אֲדׂנׇי יֱהוִֹה]] Jos 7:7, Ju Jdg 6:22, Je 1:6, Je 4:10, Je 14:13, Je 32:17, Ez Eze 4:14, Eze 9:8, Eze 11:13, Eze 21:5.
